mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT B.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S_DETAILADDRESS FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN STORE S ON B.S_NO = S.S_NO ORDER BY B.B_IDX DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT T.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S.S_DETAILADDRESS FROM TESTING T LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO ORDER BY T.T_IDX DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM STORE ORDER BY S_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND S_NO <> 99
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINE WHERE W_NAME LIKE '%' || INITCAP(#{searchKeyword}) || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WINE (W_NO, W_WINEERY, W_NAME, W_VINTAGE, W_AVG, W_REVIEWS, W_LOCATION, W_IMAGE, W_KIND) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(W_NO),0)+1 FROM WINE), #{w_wineery}, #{w_name}, #{w_vintage}, #{w_avg}, #{w_reviews}, #{w_location}, #{w_image}, #{w_kind} )
